title: Socialist Standard - July 2008.pdf
description:
Socialist Standard July 2008 -

Front cover : ?Where Dreams Go To Die ? the History of Trying to Make Poverty History?

Articles ? 
?Suffer the Little Children ? under New Labour? (child poverty)
